settings.question: How does the compatibility checker work?
settings.answer: Our compatibility checker verifies that all components in your build will work together. It checks CPU and motherboard socket compatibility, RAM compatibility with motherboards, physical dimensions of components, and power supply requirements.

settings.question: Can I save my PC build for later?
settings.answer: Yes! Create an account or log in to save your PC configurations. You can save multiple builds and return to them at any time.

settings.question: How accurate are the performance estimates?
settings.answer: Our performance estimates are based on real-world benchmarks and testing. They provide a good approximation of what you can expect from your build, but actual performance may vary depending on specific use cases and software.

settings.question: Do you offer assembly services for custom PCs?
settings.answer: Yes, we offer professional assembly services for all custom PC builds. Simply add the assembly service to your cart along with your components.
